summary:
I'm a Senior Data Analyst at GAMZ B.V. with more than 8 years' experience in data analytics in the computer gaming industry. Currently, I'm based in Amsterdam, Netherlands.
I have worked either with big world-wide-known products with a million audience or dozens of small mobile projects starting from the first launch and open beta tests.
A deep understanding of in-game activity KPIs, monetization mechanics, user paying and gameplay behavior as well as a good knowledge base in statistical methods for data analysis and testing statistical hypotheses allows me to provide professional analysis, draw up valuable recommendations for business metrics improvement and develop methodologies for evaluating the efficiency of implemented in-game features.
My experience in planning, running, and evaluating AB tests is useful in a modern market for improving product performance and delivering additional value either to the business or to its customers. Vast reporting experience, strong data visualization skills, and good experience in working with big data allow me to provide operative assistance in decision-making to management and technical specialists and can also be valuable for BI system development.
Accuracy and responsibility, effective communication skills and patience, desire to learn new knowledge, and sharing my experience with other teams make me a good candidate who can be an effective team member and make a contribution to products.

Please, see the detailed information about my work experience, job responsibilities, and technical skills in the Experience section below.

courses.name: In-company offline English classes by Wargaming University (Upper-Intermediate).
In-company offline course ‘Python Programming Fundamentals for Data Analysts’ by Wargaming University.
Online course ‘Open Machine Learning Source’ by OpenDataScience.
Online practical course in Stepik platform ‘Fundamentals of Statistics pt.1’.
Online practical course in Stepik platform ‘Fundamentals of Statistics pt.2’.
Online practical course in Stepik platform ‘Introduction in Data Science and Machine Learning’
Online practical course ‘Feature Engineering' by Kaggle.
Online practical course ‘Intermediate Machine Learning' by Kaggle.
Online practical course ‘Intro to Machine Learning' by Kaggle.
Online practical course ’SQL Databases’ in Open education platform by St.Petersburg State University.

profile_positions.description:
Reporting
- Regular analytical reporting, comparative analysis, and evaluation of the effectiveness of project changes.

АB-testing
- Development of a methodology for testing statistical hypotheses as a part of ab-test results analysis. Making recommendations for planning, designing, running, processing, and evaluating experiments for the AB-test functionality in the BI system. Sampling, evaluating, analyzing, and reporting the results of past experiments.

Dashboards and reports
- Collection and formalization of customer requirements for online analytical dashboards and reports development in popular visual analytic platforms. Data source engineering, development, and testing of analytical dashboards and reports.

EDA and Researches
- Exploratory data analysis and searching for the in-game user patterns, events dependencies, and anomalies. Solving tasks of forecasting, clustering, and classification using ML methods.

Ad-Hoc tasks
- Solving Ad-Hoc tasks through database queries to provide operative assistance in decision-making to management and technical specialists. Data analysis and searching for bugs and technical problems.

Analytic consulting
- Drawing up recommendations, forming and updating the list of events and parameters needed for logging and monitoring within the project's analytics. Providing analytical support and advice for development, QA, and game design teams.
profile_positions.title: Senior Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Reporting
- Regular analytical reporting, development of metrics, and methodologies for efficiency evaluating of in-game events, promotions, and discounts released by the Monetization and Server-Side Events Department.

Researches
- Collection and formalization of customer requests for research.
- Analysis and testing of existing monetization tools and methods used by the Monetization and
Server-Side Events Department, formation rules for its use, drawing up recommendations for improvement.
- Analysis of the new monetization tools, modeling of possible results, and estimating potential risks in case of it in-game implementation.
- Presentation of research results.

АB-testing
- Preliminary analysis and recommendations during planning and designing price experiments through AB-testing. Sampling, evaluating, analyzing, and reporting the results of experiments.

Ad-Hoc tasks
- Ad-Hoc querying to databases for operative assistance in decision-making to management.

Dashboards
- Collection of customer requirements for the development of analytical dashboards.

Analytic consulting
- Consulting and knowledge sharing with other teams to increase the effectiveness and attractiveness of in-game events and promotions in Wargaming projects.
profile_positions.title: Research Analyst

profile_positions.description:
- Preliminary audit procedures (studying the organization’s activities, controls, identifying risks).
- Basic audit procedures (client requesting and monitoring responses, extraction and processing of the data from accounting programs, designing and testing controls, analysis of changes and movements in balances for the reporting period, exploring the detected differences).
- Participation in inventories conducted by clients as a part of the audit of the inventory procedure.
- Journal entry testing and reporting.
- Working with Financial statements (checking calculations, versions, formatting, filling out Financial statements forms).
- Working with letters of confirmation (debtors/creditors sampling for the purpose of balances confirmation, letters preparation and sending, monitoring responses).
- Documentation of contracts, and protocols in Russian and English.
profile_positions.title: Audit Assistant
